languages.text: {n}Один из хмурых визитеров с пересекающим лицо тонким шрамом вскидывает голову и с горечью произносит:{/n} "И что нам с того? Что?! Наши друзья и родители умирали за вас, благородных, десятками, а вы тут... речи нам читаете".

{n}One of the scowling visitors with a thin scar across his face tosses his head back and says bitterly,{/n} "So what? Why should we care? Our friends and parents died in their dozens for you noble lot, and you just... give us speeches."
languages.original_text: {n}Один из хмурых визитеров с пересекающим лицо тонким шрамом вскидывает голову и с горечью произносит:{/n} "И что нам с того? Что?! Наши друзья и родители умирали за вас, благородных, десятками, а вы тут... речи нам читаете".

traits.locale_text: {n}Suddenly all the sounds in the module are drowned out by a very loud sniffle. It has the effect of a dam burst — you now hear whispers, sobs, and subtle grumbles. One of the older orphans, a teenager with a thin scar across his face, tosses his head back and says bitterly,{/n} "So what? Why should we care? Our friends and parents died for you noble lot by the dozens, and you just... give us speeches."

{n}Suddenly all the sounds in the module are drowned out by a very loud sniffle. It has the effect of a dam burst — you now hear whispers, sobs, and subtle grumbles. One of the older orphans, a teenager with a thin scar across his face, tosses his head back and says bitterly,{/n} "So what? Why should we care? Our friends and parents died for you noble lot by the dozens, and you just... give us speeches."

{n}One of the scowling visitors with a thin scar across his face tosses his head back and says bitterly,{/n} "So what? Why should we care? Our friends and parents died in their dozens for you noble lot, and you just... give us speeches."

{n}One of the scowling visitors with a thin scar across his face tosses his head back and says bitterly,{/n} "So what? Why should we care? Our friends and parents died in their dozens for you noble lot, and you just... give us speeches."

{n}One of the scowling visitors with a thin scar across his face tosses his head back and says bitterly,{/n} "So what? Why should we care? Our friends and parents died in their dozens for you noble lot, and you just... give us speeches."

{n}One of the scowling visitors with a thin scar across his face tosses his head back and says bitterly,{/n} "So what? Why should we care? Our friends and parents died in their dozens for you noble lot, and you just... give us speeches."

languages.text: {n}其中一个少年脸上带着细疤，满面悲苦。他把头往后一扬，痛苦地开了口。{/n}“可这又怎么样？我们凭什么要在乎这些？为了你们这群贵族，我们的朋友与父母前仆后继地送死，而你仅仅是……对我们说些漂亮话而已。”
languages.original_text: {n}One of the scowling visitors with a thin scar across his face tosses his head back and says bitterly,{/n} "So what? Why should we care? Our friends and parents died in their dozens for you noble lot, and you just... give us speeches."

traits.locale_text: {n}突然之间，船舱中所有的声音都被响亮的抽泣声盖过。这声抽泣仿佛水坝崩塌一样，你随后便听到了窃窃私语、啜泣与隐晦的抱怨声。其中一位年纪大一些的孤儿，一个脸上带着一道细疤的少年，他把头往后一甩，痛苦地说道：{/n}“可这又怎么样？我们凭什么要在乎这些？为了你们这群贵族，我们的朋友与父母前仆后继地送死，而你仅仅是……对我们说些漂亮话而已。”

languages.text: {n}Uno de los visitantes, con una cicatriz en la cara, echa atrás la cabeza y murmura amargamente:{/n} «¿Y qué? ¿Por qué debería importarnos? Nuestros amigos y padres han muerto a montones por los nobles y nos... dais discursos».
languages.original_text: {n}One of the scowling visitors with a thin scar across his face tosses his head back and says bitterly,{/n} "So what? Why should we care? Our friends and parents died in their dozens for you noble lot, and you just... give us speeches."

traits.locale_text: {n}De pronto, un sonoro sollozo tapa el ruido del módulo y provoca una reacción en cadena. Oyes susurros, lloros y alguna que otra queja. Uno de los huérfanos mayores, un adolescente con una cicatriz en la cara, levanta la cabeza y declara amargamente:{/n} «¿Y qué? ¿Qué más nos da? Nuestros padres y amigos han muerto en masa por los nobles como tú y... solo nos dais discursos».

languages.text: {n}訪れた者のひとり、顔中にうっすら傷跡のある無愛想なその男が、頭を後ろに倒して辛辣に吐き捨てる。{/n}「だから何だ？俺達にどうしろって？友も親も、貴族連中のために何十人も命を落として、あんたらはただ…演説を垂れるってのか」
languages.original_text: {n}One of the scowling visitors with a thin scar across his face tosses his head back and says bitterly,{/n} "So what? Why should we care? Our friends and parents died in their dozens for you noble lot, and you just... give us speeches."

traits.locale_text: {n}突然、モジュール内のすべての音が非常に大きな鼻息によってかき消される。それがまるで堰を切ったかのようだった…ささやき声、すすり泣き、ささやかな不平不満が聞こえてくる。年長の孤児の一人、顔に薄い傷のある10代の青年が、頭を後ろに倒して苦々しげに言った。{/n}「だからなんなの？僕らの友人や両親は、あなたたち高貴な人たちのために何十人も死んでいったのに、あなたたちはただ…僕らに演説するだけじゃないか」

languages.text: {n}Einer der mürrischen Besucher mit einer dünnen Narbe im Gesicht wirft den Kopf zurück und sagt verbittert:{/n} "Und? Warum sollte uns das interessieren? Unsere Freunde und Eltern sind für Euch Adlige zu Dutzenden gestorben, und Ihr ... haltet nur Reden."
languages.original_text: {n}One of the scowling visitors with a thin scar across his face tosses his head back and says bitterly,{/n} "So what? Why should we care? Our friends and parents died in their dozens for you noble lot, and you just... give us speeches."

traits.locale_text: {n}Einer der mürrischen Besucher mit einer dünnen Narbe im Gesicht wirft den Kopf zurück und sagt verbittert:{/n} "Und? Warum sollte uns das interessieren? Unsere Freunde und Eltern sind für Euch Adlige zu Dutzenden gestorben, und Ihr ... haltet nur Reden."

languages.text: {n}L'air renfrogné, l'un des visiteurs, au visage traversé d'une fine balafre, rejette la tête en arrière et lance d'un ton amer :{/n} « Et alors ? Qu'est-ce que ça peut nous faire ? Nos amis et nos parents sont morts par dizaines pour les nobles comme vous, et tout ce que vous trouvez à faire, c'est prononcer des discours. »
languages.original_text: {n}One of the scowling visitors with a thin scar across his face tosses his head back and says bitterly,{/n} "So what? Why should we care? Our friends and parents died in their dozens for you noble lot, and you just... give us speeches."

traits.locale_text: {n}Soudain, tous les sons du module sont engloutis par un reniflement très bruyant. Il a l'effet d'une rupture de barrage : vous entendez maintenant des murmures, des sanglots et des grognements discrets. L'un des orphelins les plus âgés, un adolescent au visage traversé d'une fine balafre, rejette sa tête en arrière et lance sur un ton amer :{/n} « Et alors ? Qu'est-ce que ça peut nous faire ? Nos amis et nos parents sont morts par dizaines pour les nobles comme vous, et tout ce que vous trouvez à faire, c'est prononcer un discours. »

languages.text: {n}İncecik bir yara izi yüzünü uçtan uca geçen, çatık kaşlı bir ziyaretçi, kafasını geriye atarak burukça konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Ne önemi var? Umurumuzda olduğunu mu zannediyorsunuz? Arkadaşlarımız ve ailelerimiz, siz soylular için savaşırken canından oldu. Siz de... Dikilmiş nutuk çekiyorsunuz."
languages.original_text: {n}One of the scowling visitors with a thin scar across his face tosses his head back and says bitterly,{/n} "So what? Why should we care? Our friends and parents died in their dozens for you noble lot, and you just... give us speeches."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yüzü boyunca incecik bir yara bulunan, çatık kaşlı ziyaretçilerden biri, kafasını geriye atarak burukça konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Ne önemi var? Umurumuzda olduğunu mu zannediyorsunuz? Arkadaşlarımız ve ailelerimiz, siz soylular için savaşırken canından oldu. Siz de… Siz de burada dikilip nutuk çekiyorsunuz."
